update OM_AUTOSHIP_GIFT_RULE
MARKET_ID = #{marketId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RULE_CODE = #{ruleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RULE_NAME = #{ruleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTIVE_MONTH = #{activeMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MONTH = #{month,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CALCULATION_TYPE = #{calculationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CALCULATION_VALUE = #{calculationValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER + 1,
REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

where RULE_ID = #{ruleId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update OM_AUTOSHIP_GIFT_RULE set MARKET_ID = #{marketId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RULE_CODE = #{ruleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RULE_NAME = #{ruleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTIVE_MONTH = #{activeMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MONTH = #{month,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CALCULATION_TYPE = #{calculationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CALCULATION_VALUE = #{calculationValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER + 1, REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY = #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE7 = #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE8 = #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE9 = #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE11 = #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE12 = #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE13 = #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE14 = #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE15 = #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RULE_ID = #{ruleId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select rule.RULE_ID, rule.MARKET_ID, rule.RULE_CODE, rule.RULE_NAME, rule.STATUS, rule.ACTIVE_MONTH, rule.MONTH, rule.CALCULATION_TYPE, rule.CALCULATION_VALUE from OM_AUTOSHIP_GIFT_RULE rule, SPM_SALES_ORGANIZATION_B sales where sales.SALES_ORG_ID = #{salesOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and sales.MARKET_ID = rule.MARKET_ID and rule.STATUS = 'Y'
